name: Unlikely adventures of Constantly Sweating Guy and Random Electric Discharge Lady in Dangerous Space
name_original: Unlikely adventures of Constantly Sweating Guy and Random Electric Discharge Lady in Dangerous Space
description: In a prison space station there was a disaster as a result of a solar flare. Everyone died except two prisoners. As a result our heroes got incredible powers that made them Constantly Sweating Guy and Electric Discharge Lady. The event caused the survivors escape from their cells. They need to get out of the desintegrating station. However, they don't expect that their powers can be more harmful than useful.
